settings.title: {PROFESSIONAL} BODY PIERCING SERVICES
settings.text: At SkinKandy, we’re all about safe, high-quality piercings performed by expert piercers in a clean and welcoming environment. Whether it’s your first piercing or you’re adding to your collection, our team is here to provide a professional, comfortable, and enjoyable experience.

settings.title: OUR {PIERCING} SERVICES
settings.text:
We offer a wide range of professional body piercings, from classic ear lobe piercings to cartilage, nose, and body piercings. Each piercing is performed by our highly trained team using industry-leading hygiene practices and high-quality jewellery for the best results. 

Ears – Lobes, Helix, Conch, Tragus, Forward Helix & more 

Face – Nose, Septum, Eyebrow, Lip & more 

Body – Navel, Nipple & more 

Advanced – Industrial, Dermal, Surface & more

Children’s Piercings – Safe & professional lobe piercings from 6 months old

settings.title: WHY {CHOOSE} {SKINKANDY?}
settings.text:
✔ Global Leaders in Body Piercing: Over 70 Stores available Australia-wide & in New Zealand

✔ Highly Trained Piercers – Every team member completes our extensive piercing program

✔ Strict Hygiene & Safety – We follow the highest industry standards for sterile and safe procedures 

Whether you're getting your first piercing or your next one, trust SkinKandy for a professional experience from start to finish.

settings.title: {PREMIUM} JEWELLERY OPTIONS
settings.text:
Your jewellery matters. That’s why we offer only high-quality materials to ensure a safe and stylish piercing experience.

14K SOLID GOLD 

  • Ideal for sensitive skin 
  • Won’t tarnish or wear 

IMPLANT GRADE TITANIUM 

  • Lightweight and ultra-strong 
  • Nickel-free 
  • Encourages faster healing 

316L SURGICAL STEEL 

  • Durable and affordable 
  • High-quality finish 
  • A great option for healed piercings

settings.title: {PIERCING} PRICING ESTIMATOR
settings.decription: Wondering how much your piercing will cost? Use our pricing estimator to check the cost of your preferred piercing, including different jewellery options.
settings.footnote:
Want two piercings in one go? Add double operator service for just $15!
*Applies to all standard piercings, surgical steel jewellery included
settings.calcu_footnote: The total piercing cost is an estimate and may vary based on your selection and store availability

settings.title: 14K SOLID GOLD:
settings.text: Hypoallergenic, durable, and beautiful. Our solid gold jewellery is perfect for little ears and won’t tarnish or wear down over time.

settings.title: IMPLANT GRADE TITANIUM:
settings.text: Strong, lightweight, and nickel-free, implant grade titanium is an excellent choice for faster healing, especially for kids with sensitive skin.

settings.title: {OUR} {JEWELLERY} {OPTIONS:} BEAUTIFUL AND SAFE
settings.description: Not only do we stock a large range of initial piercing jewellery (including titanium and 14kt solid gold), we also have a range of high-quality studs and sleepers in all kinds of fun designs to change to when the piercings are healed.
